topic.title: HPE Helion Public Cloud Relational Database (RDB) Overview

body.p: The HPE Helion Public Cloud Relational Database (RDB) provides you with a simplified method for creation and management of MySQL database instances.

section.title: API
section.p: Do you need low level, raw REST API access to HPE Helion Public Cloud RDB? Take a look at the RDB API page.
